captions.text:
A lot of you guys have
been asking for a video

where the CGH kids do
hairstyles on my mom,

so today, we decided
to just that.

We each picked a unique that
we are going to do on my mom,

and it's going to
show a small part

of each one of
our personalities.

I love all the
styles you picked.

Now, I want you guys to all
join together and show me

Oh my goodness, you
guys, how did you

-Well, first off, your
name sounds like Minnie.
and you always look so cute.

-And you always buy me
mouse ears at Disneyland.
I love Minnie, I have to say.

I love that we have
all these memories

That's so great-- or me
and my lovely hairstyle.

So if you guys want
to see a tutorial

on these adorable Minnie Mouse
buns, click the box right here.

We were even granted access
to film it in Disneyland.

Or, you can click the
description box below.

We'll also stick
a link in there.
And we will see you guys later.

-Take that second
half of her hair,

twist it around our fingers, go
ahead find our little tunnel.

title: It is Mom's Turn | CGH Kids Style Mindy's Hair
